lead_paragraph: A judge ruled that caddies had signed a contract that required them to wear bibs and could not claim that corporate sponsorship on the bibs made them human billboards.

headline.main: Caddies Lose Lawsuit Against PGA Tour

snippet: A judge ruled that caddies had signed a contract that required them to wear bibs and could not claim that corporate sponsorship on the bibs made them human billboards.
abstract: Judge Vince Chhabria of Federal District Court upholds contract between caddies and PGA Tour and rules organization can require caddies to wear bibs that have corporate sponsorship information on them.
